nodes.text: The Gardens of T'alla were gardens that, according to the Qel-Droma Epics, existed on the Jedi planet Ossus. According to the Epics, the gardens were built at the Great Jedi Library by the Neti Jedi Master T'alla, who later planted herself at the centre, becoming a tree. The Epics further claimed that the gardens continued to grow over millennia, and that the tree thought to be T'alla was a favoured spot for visitors to meditate.
